thread.title: War in Syria: It is still about the Oil | Politics
thread.title_full: War in Syria: It is still about the Oil | Politics

author: beforeitsnews.com
title: War in Syria: It is still about the Oil | Politics
text:
(Before It's News)
http://real-agenda.com/feed
The plan to attack and destroy 7 countries in the Middle East is modeled on a US document which explains which countries will be conquered by the US imperialist forces and its allies in the region. It is well-known that Syria is one of those countries to be destroyed and conquered, as were Iraq, Afghanistan, Libya and Yemen. The question to be asked is why now? We know that the Syrian refugees, like the Palestinians, Iraqis, Yemenis and Afghans are fleeing war, hunger, oppression and bombings carried out by the US and its allies such as Saudi Arabia, Qatar, Turkey, France, England and others. It is also known that Israel is the only imperialist bastion in the Middle East, which was given land that was not theirs, right in the middle of an Arab region divided into three groups: Muslims, Christians and Jews. Yes, three of the most important religious denominations come from the Arab population. What many still ask is, what is the real reason for the current war in Syria? It is oil. Yes, it still is. Even in a world where the value of this product has fallen to almost half the price it was just a year ago, the area around Syria is considered as the source of the new oil, the inexhaustible type. We know that neither Western imperialist governments nor the corporations these governments work for, intend to make available new forms of energy to replace oil, at least not in a way in which these forms of energy will replace oil as a whole. There is much more to know about the history of the Middle East if you want to understand the reasons of the current war in Syria. The following video by WHYMAPS explains in a clear and concise way the origin of the conflict.
The post War in Syria: It is still about the Oil appeared first on The Real Agenda News .
